attributes.action: Give Holyrood and the Scottish people the power to call for another referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Therefore, it is clear that there has been a swing in favour of independence.  However, Scotland must still ask Westminster for permission to influence constitutional change.  This is unjustifiable in a democracy.
attributes.background: In the aftermath of last year's referendum, support for the SNP rocketed and showed that the question of Scottish independence had not been resolved in spite of the 55% in favour of the union.  This decision was further brought in to question with the landslide general election result this year.
